Description: Prohibition Notice P/SJS28-SPS-20220322-1 (312370683) You are storing and using WM Strip which contains dichloromethane in such a way that employees may breathe in the vapour given off by the substance. Breathing in the vapour may result in narcotic effects including headaches and drowsiness and that exposure to high concentrations of dichloromethane may result in unconsciousness and death.
